title: '[DOCS] <short summary>'

assignees: ''
---

## Location
Link or path to the page/section (README, QUICKSTART, docs/, wiki, etc.).

## Issue
What is missing, unclear, outdated, or incorrect?

## Suggested change
Describe the update you would like to see (wording, examples, code snippets, diagrams).

## Audience
Who is this update for? (new users, library maintainers, advanced consumers)

## Additional context
References, related issues/PRs, or examples that clarify the request.
